description:
spec: add forward links from 'method set' to where it gets used

Fixes issue 1797.

messages.text: http://codereview.appspot.com/5645058/diff/6001/doc/go_spec.html File doc/go_spec.html (right): http://codereview.appspot.com/5645058/diff/6001/doc/go_spec.html#newcode660 doc/go_spec.html:660: consists of all methods with receiver type T. On 2012/02/08 18:57:25, gri wrote: > This is actually not strictly correct because of embedding. > > Should probably be corrected (separate CL, I think). I agree that it would be a separate CL. I think it is fine as is, though: embedding adds new methods with receiver type T.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

LGTM http://codereview.appspot.com/5645058/diff/6001/doc/go_spec.html File doc/go_spec.html (right): http://codereview.appspot.com/5645058/diff/6001/doc/go_spec.html#newcode3 doc/go_spec.html:3: "Subtitle": "Version of February 6, 2012" s/6/8/ http://codereview.appspot.com/5645058/diff/6001/doc/go_spec.html#newcode660 doc/go_spec.html:660: consists of all methods with receiver type T. This is actually not strictly correct because of embedding. Should probably be corrected (separate CL, I think). http://codereview.appspot.com/5645058/diff/6001/doc/go_spec.html#newcode670 doc/go_spec.html:670: can be called using that type ... using a receiver of that type (?)

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=93f55b15c3af ***

spec: add forward links from 'method set' to where it gets used

Fixes issue 1797.
